00096 // just about only use pointers as item-data, I've choosen to disable
00097 // this function to prevent mistakes. Use SetItemPtrData instead.

00241 
00242     // return the text for the given column of the given item
00243     virtual wxString OnGetItemText(long item, long column) const;
00244 
00245     // return the icon for the given item. In report view, OnGetItemImage will
00246     // only be called for the first column. See OnGetItemColumnImage for
00247     // details.
00248     virtual int OnGetItemImage(long item) const;
00249 
00250     // return the icon for the given item and column.
00251     virtual int OnGetItemColumnImage(long item, long column) const;
00252 
00253     // return the attribute for the item (may return NULL if none)
00254     virtual wxListItemAttr *OnGetItemAttr(long item) const;

00274 /*
00275  * wxListCtrl has to be a real class or we have problems with
00276  * the run-time information.
00277  */
00278 
00279 class wxListCtrl: public wxGenericListCtrl
00280 {
00281 public:
00282     wxListCtrl() {}
00283 
00284     wxListCtrl(wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID winid = wxID_ANY,
00285                const wxPoint& pos = wxDefaultPosition,
00286                const wxSize& size = wxDefaultSize,
00287                long style = wxLC_ICON,
00288                const wxValidator &validator = wxDefaultValidator,
00289                const wxString &name = wxListCtrlNameStr)
00290     : wxGenericListCtrl(parent, winid, pos, size, style, validator, name)
00291     {
00292     }
00293     
00294 };
